pr_title: SAK-41604 Add group support to rubrics

timeline.bodyText: Since this is the value at instantiation should this be NONE here?
timeline.author: ern

replies.bodyText: Suppose so. I only added the NONE type as I needed the zero based ordinal to allow clean DB backfills in the update scripts, to be honest. An evaluation's status shoud either be USER or GROUP, never anything else.
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: I removed the NONE enum  and made the column nullable, with a default on the bean of USER. This seems to make sense to me.
replies.author: adrianfish
